datasource
Class HsqldbDataSource

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.commons.dbcp.BasicDataSource
      datasource.HsqldbDataSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.sql.Wrapper, javax.sql.CommonDataSource, javax.sql.DataSource
public class HsqldbDataSource
extends org.apache.commons.dbcp.BasicDataSource

Datasource that shuts down the hsqldb when the data source is closed. hsql is normally only shutdown with a JVM hook, so this datasource is better suited when you need to shutdown/restart within one JVM.

See Also:
http://hsqldb.org
